mapper.select: SELECT p."id" AS "workPlanId", s."id" AS "scheduleId", s."slot" AS "slot", s."maximum" AS "maximum", s."num" AS "num" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN p JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN_SCHEDULE s ON p."id" = s."work_plan_id" WHERE p."date" = TO_DATE('${date}') AND p."doctor_id" = ${doctorId} ORDER BY s."id"
